abstract: He talks about Google, President Obama and his own retirement.
snippet: He talks about Google, President Obama and his own retirement.
lead_paragraph: Folks in the media are so used to considering Rupert Murdoch as a spectral presence that it is sometimes hard to remember that behind a name so freighted with meaning lurks a real actual guy. That’s why it’s fun spending time watching Sky News Australia’s 37-minute interview with him. There is no major news splash, but there is value in watching Mr. Murdoch’s mind and mouth work in the long on-camera interview with Sky’s David Speers last week.

abstract: In an effort to sustain Bing’s early momentum, Microsoft is adding new features, including local weather and events and results from Wolfram Alpha, a Web service that specializes in answering questions.
snippet: In an effort to sustain Bing’s early momentum, Microsoft is adding new features, including local weather and events and results from Wolfram Alpha, a Web service that specializes in answering questions.
lead_paragraph: Like the ringing sound it is supposed to evoke, Bing has resonated with many users and advertisers. Microsoft‘s new search engine, first introduced in May, has made modest but steady gains in market share against Google and Yahoo.

headline.main: Bing Adds Features, Including Results From Wolfram Alpha
